name: Zelda 64
description:
Remember in SpaceWorld 1995 when the first clip of The Legends Of Zelda: Ocarina Of Time was seen? It looked extremely different than the final product right? That was because Link was going to use his model from the original Zelda games, and the game was supposed to be released on the Nintendo 64 Disk Drive or Nintendo 64DD.

I have recreated the game using HTML5 and Javascript. It's the smallest game your gonna get of Zelda 64, honey. You can walk around the world that I created, but don't go to far, or you're gonna die.
